overview: Doug Dennerline serves as EVP of Enterprise Sales Americas for Salesforce. Dennerline brings over 20 years of sales leadership experience to the company, having served most recently as senior vice president and general manager of the Collaboration Software Group at Cisco, which includes its software-as-a-service strategy and products, and all WebEx conferencing and collaboration offerings. He will report to Frank van Veenendaal, president, worldwide sales, and chief sales officer at Salesforce.com.
